mapper.select: select pd.name,pd.display_name,pd.version,t.* from wf_process_instance t left join wf_process_define pd on t.process_define_id=pd.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select pd.name,pd.display_name,pd.version,t.* from wf_process_instance t left join wf_process_define pd on t.process_define_id=pd.id where t.id = #{id}
